Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I love going there and I love the aesthetic of this shop. The staff are really friendly and they are pretty quick with giving you whatever you ordered. Whether you sit inside, outside or just grab something to go. I'd highly recommended this place!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We come at least 3 times a week‚Ä¶ and not only is coffee good, the people working here are always SO nice they make us want to come back every time :) !!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love love love this place!   My son lives on the same road as this place.  Everything is made fresh and the coffee is great.  I had a tomatoe bagel which was really tasty and had chicken and mango on it.  Lots of chouces on their menu.  You ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great bagels, excellent coffee, friendly service. Try the BLT!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love B&B - has ended up being my local after living in Spaarndammerbuurt for 3 years. The service is some of the best I've had in The Netherlands, Patrick the owner goes out of his way to know what I like and has great, friendly chat. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great place to relax and go for a coffee and a bagel.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Phenomenal food, simple but with the best ingredients. Service was on point and had plenty of recommendations for places to see and things to do. Highly recommended (get the smoked chicken and avocado, much better than at 'The Avocado Show')
